## CreateBucketOptions class

Optional configuration specified at bucket creation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CreateBucketOptions extends BaseOptions 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseOptions](./api-common.baseoptions.md)

## Remarks

In addition to specifying the bucket region, <code>CreateBucketOptions</code> allow you to specify access level as "private" or "public-read". Depending on the cloud platform, the access specification may translate to different security mechanisms.

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(providerOptions)](./api-buckets.createbucketoptions._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs the options object with supplied provider-specific options |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [access](./api-buckets.createbucketoptions.access.md) |  | [Access](./api-buckets.access.md) | Access level: private or public-read |
|  [location?](./api-buckets.createbucketoptions.location.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Bucket region if different than default |
